General.Text: Caller lost an object, Police required
Drive to the ~g~caller~s~ & find out what the issue is.

Conversation.Dialogue: ~b~Caller~s~: Thank you very much! I wish I had eyes like you!

OutcomeCellphone.Dialogue: ~b~Caller~s~: Yes, I called. I can't find my cellphone.
~y~You~s~: I understand. I will help you to find it.
~y~You~s~: When was the last time you used it?
~b~Caller~s~: I was walking right here & I thought I had put it in my pocket.
~y~You~s~: Then it must be somewhere nearby. Lets take a look.

OutcomeWallet.Dialogue: ~b~Caller~s~: Yes, it was me. I lost my wallet & I can't find it.
~y~You~s~: Oh dear. I'm sure we will find it.
~y~You~s~: Do you remember the last time you had it?
~b~Caller~s~: Yeah, just a minute ago. It must be around here.

OutcomeShoe.Dialogue: ~b~Caller~s~: Yes, I need your help. I have a huuuge problem.
~b~Caller~s~: I lost my shoe... my poor shoe, I loved it soo much!
~y~You~s~: Ahhh... sorry, this is not a reason to call the police.
~b~Caller~s~: But is was a 100$ shoe! I'm sorry, but can you please help me search it?
~y~You~s~: Okay, I will help you search your shoe. Let's search the area.
~y~You~s~: No, as I said. Please only call the police for emergencies. Have a nice rest of the day!
~y~You~s~: Alright, but next time only call for emergencies! Bye!
